0.23.text: Hello, today is Tuesday, which on Quiet as Mouse means Reviews Day.

4.60.text:
and today I'm reviewing a book which is The
Secret Diary

7.87.text:
of Lizzie Bennet, which I just finished. The
Secret Diary of Lizzie Bennet is based on the

11.77.text:
webseries The Lizzie Bennet Diaries,  which is
based on Pride and Prejudice by Jane

15.11.text: Austen. It's in the form of a

16.50.text:
diary, which is perhaps evident from the
title but I thought it was important to

21.36.text:
I can't imagine that a person who likes
the Lizzie Bennet Diaries,

25.91.text:
the web series, wouldn't like this book. It's a
very good tie-in,

29.91.text:
it's a very good extra. It stands on its
own but I think

33.06.text:
definitely it's better if you have seen
the webseries.

36.22.text:
Also I found that the entries which I
most enjoyed were the ones

40.38.text:
where I could vividly remember the
episode that was being

43.96.text:
reffered to. I think I would enjoy
reading this either

47.11.text: at the same time as watching The Lizzie Bennet Diaries, or immediately after watching

51.82.text:
One of my favorite things about this
book is that it adds stuff that you just

54.82.text:
can't get from the video blog format, for
instance

57.53.text:
I feel like I know Mr and Mrs
Bennet much better

61.02.text: now I've read this than I did from the

64.50.text:
Lizzie Bennet Diaries. Also some of the
events mentioned

67.50.text:
in the Diaries are in more detail in
this, for example the Gibson wedding

71.87.text: and Lizzie, Darcy and Gigi's trip around

74.99.text: San Francisco, Darcy's letter. Lots of  important things that just wouldn't

79.57.text: work in the video blog format

81.65.text:
but which work perfectly well in a private
journal. Obviously there's also some things

85.59.text: in the video blogs which aren't in this.

86.90.text:
I wouldn't say that you need to read it
if you watched and liked the

90.21.text:
Lizzie Bennet Diaries, but I would say that it is
an excellent addition.

93.29.text:
I really enjoyed it, it's well written, I enjoyed
reading it in Lizzie's voice. As a

96.84.text: female YouTube content creator I found I related a lot to the Lizzie

100.67.text:
in this book. If we're doing the rating
things which I

103.89.text: guess we are doing, then I gave The Lizzie Bennet Diaries 4.6 out of 5,

108.94.text:
so I guess I'll give this 4.4. And finally,
I'm going to be trying to do book reviews

115.73.text:
and the next book I'm going to be reviewing
is The Thirteenth Tale

118.85.text: by Diane Setterfield. I've enjoyed the TV

122.14.text:
adaptation at Christmas so I'm very much
looking forward to reading this,

125.35.text: and that will be up on the 29th July. Also in case

128.99.text: by any chance anybody wants to read the books that I'm going to be reviewing

132.94.text: the one after that will be The Ocean at the End of the Lane,

136.16.text:
and that'll be on the 12th August. Let me
know what you thought about The Secret Diary

140.58.text: the comments below and I'll see you tomorrow.
